item.title: Init
item.description: Homeserver…… Finally giving it a shot. Proxmox Heimdall I do not know what I need on the homeserver so started with these 2. Proxmox ISO generation - Rufus, Balena Etcher, etc upto you Should have access to your router web portal (Extremely Important), more on this later. Lots of interesting guidesd to follow up - (Link) That’s pretty much it. Step 1 is easy. Step 2: i) Know you DEFAULT GATEWAY ii) Know you LAN IP RANGE (192.
